DataTable Gym_administration.mySqlConn.dtGetTableForDataGrid ( string  sQuery  ) 

This function executes the specified query on the database and returns a DataTable ready to use in a DataGridView component. [string] sQuery

Returns:
[DataTable] The DataTable object if there is no data, the object will be returned empty.

Definition at line 170 of file mySqlConn.cs.

List<Hashtable> Gym_administration.mySqlConn.lhSqlQuery ( string  sQuery  ) 

Execute an arbitrary query string against the active database, very similar to the PHP way. Do not use this function for INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE queries.

Parameters:
string sQuery The prepared statement query to run.
Returns:
[List<Hashtable>] A List<HashTable> containing the data retrieved from the databse. This date can be used with a foreach loop or directly htResultset[index][fieldName]
